children.author: Thistles
children.comment: My point is that a 3-4 foot jump is easy for a cat. He wasted time opening a door to make a jump he didn't need help to make. Smart that 1

My 16 year old cat can jump to the top of a 6 foot book case from the floor. She doesn't need a stepping stool.
